channel.title: [Classic] - Runescape Classic private server.[20x reg 40x wild exp rate!]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Classic[/size] -runescape classic private server. Hey whats up everyone i wanna start of by saying i like the runescape classic gameplay and the whole aspect of Staking and Pking. Also, i like to do some skilling if it pays off, because i like to make money. The server has every stat except Agility(who ever really used the stat nehow lol). All skill stats are designed to give a payout. There is Fletching town and Crafting guild with certer, mining guild with certer, Karamja banker for fishers, also a fishing guild with certers. Pot certer for herblaw. Drops from npcs in Edgeville are heavier so that you can obtain gold coins and get Started.
In Edgeville: *A 2handed sword seller infront of the general store. *Master fisher on the side of the store for free fish to help make training easier. *Portals for wilderness teleports easy pking and training spots. [url=http://postimage.org/image/s7z81uovr/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/s7z81uovr/screenshot13.jpg[/img][/url]
For PKing: Sidestat menu ::whoswild command Teleports from portals to wild. 10 second stand still delay before you can logout. [url=http://postimage.org/image/b4lshis4f/][img]http://s11.postimage.org/b4lshis4f/screenshot11.png[/img][/url]
For Fun and Looting: [url=http://postimage.org/image/nooon4ltj/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/nooon4ltj/screenshot11.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/image/wkzgr2cfr/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/wkzgr2cfr/screenshot15.png[/img][/url] [url=http://postimage.org/image/e6tj0tpiv/][img]http://s15.postimage.org/e6tj0tpiv/screenshot16.png[/img][/url]
[size=12pt]Exp rates[/size] Wilderness exp rate is 30x All stats -- 10x
Register ON FORUMS to get the Client, and to know all about the Game: [url=http://classicfun.forumotion.com]classicfun.forumotion.com[/url]
I'll be tring to update frequently as I have been :D Thanks Everyone for Looking and I Hope that people can Enjoy the Gameplay.

item.title: [Classic] - Runescape Classic private server.[20x reg 40x wild exp rate!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Boss2 The_Boss
item.description:
@The_Boss2 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:60, topic:435860"][quote author=The_Boss link=topic=538580.msg3963167#msg3963167 date=1333474448]
They’re not “Conspiracy Theories” if they are true.
[/quote]
They weren’t true, so yes, they are conspiracy theories, created up by a guy with fucked up mind.

You were extremely partial to the fins on the server

I was equal to everybody, but I’m sorry if your fucked up brain makes you think like that.

just like you’re here dick riding vibes, which is probably you just on another account.

I ain’t dick riding anybody, I’m just telling how the things are, and you are a great example of a player that creates up shit, for whatever reason, which btw, is still unclear to me. Oh now Vibes is me on another account? Why would I do that? Why would I bother? See how sick your brain is?

You clearly lack the intelligence to understand anything that you don’t want to

I could say same about you, please read above.

and instead of holding a mature discussion you just get mad and start raging. I’m not wasting my time with you.

I am holding a mature discussion, but I just don’t see the point in it so I just leave it be, you’ll never see things how they really were, instead you and your rotten brain will always think that I actually did those things you claim that I did.[/quote]

umad???

item.title: [Classic] - Runescape Classic private server.[20x reg 40x wild exp rate!]
item.dc:creator: @Vibes Vibes
item.description:
@Vibes wrote:

ok ok alot needs fixing but we have some changes to the server.

1: P2P land which means just about all the land is avalible now.
2: God staffs and capes p2p wilderness open but youll have to go to ardy to get into it.
3: 10x normal land and 30x wilderness stat experience.
4: afk timer is now set to 10 minutes.
5: titans in the wilderness that drop great drops
Edit 6: fatigue is no longer in the game, no more sleeping.

like i said more is to come and alot of fixes need to be implemented so if you find anything post on the forums please and thanks. Hope to see all you guys back online its Easter!!

Read full topic

item.title: [Classic] - Runescape Classic private server.[20x reg 40x wild exp rate!]
item.dc:creator: @The_Boss2 The_Boss
item.description:
@The_Boss2 wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:49, topic:435860"][quote author=iloveclassic69 link=topic=538580.msg3956627#msg3956627 date=1332811041]
for those of you wanting to join for these “phat events”
its waste of time false advertisement
server fails, mostly 0-2 ppl on at peak maybe 8.
no one pks.
basically a skillin n trainin server.
admin had to be told about simple glitches.
admin is very immature, he cant run an event let alone server.
bans ppl that say their gunna give their mask set away n quit.
all n all

SAV YOUR TIME, click the next server advertisement. dont waste time trainin on server that will not grow and pking does not exist
[/quote]
He’s not going to bother holding an event if 2 players are online. It’s common sense and if you aren’t an idiot you would know that.
It’s not false advertisement, read above.
You can’t expect the server to have shitloads of people in wildy if it’s brand new and hardly nobody knows about it.
How else admin could know about glitches/bugs if you don’t tell him, that’s just being retarded.
How exactly is the admin immature?, give us more info if you aren’t just raging and making things up.
How can you know that he banned you for giving mask set away? You seem to be just another retarded player that rages when you get punished for not following the rules.

I know what I’m talking about, when I had RSCFusion up, players spreaded out all kinds of bullshit which weren’t true, and one guy even made up shitloads of ridiculous conspiracy theories.

This is what happens to every single guy that tries to open up server and who has strict rules, players that are arrogant and don’t follow up rules and get banned for whatever reason, then they start creating up massive bullshit stories.

I don’t know if the admin is like what he tells us he is, but I’m just saying that don’t believe everything you hear.[/quote]

They’re not “Conspiracy Theories” if they are true. You were extremely partial to the fins on the server just like you’re here dick riding vibes, which is probably you just on another account. You clearly lack the intelligence to understand anything that you don’t want to, and instead of holding a mature discussion you just get mad and start raging. I’m not wasting my time with you.

Read full topic

[quote="-Nothing, post:52, topic:435860"][quote author=Vibes link=topic=538580.msg3959801#msg3959801 date=1333164126]

for those of you wanting to join for these “phat events”
its waste of time false advertisement
server fails, mostly 0-2 ppl on at peak maybe 8.
no one pks.
basically a skillin n trainin server.
admin had to be told about simple glitches.
admin is very immature, he cant run an event let alone server.
bans ppl that say their gunna give their mask set away n quit.
all n all

SAV YOUR TIME, click the next server advertisement. dont waste time trainin on server that will not grow and pking does not exist

He’s not going to bother holding an event if 2 players are online. It’s common sense and if you aren’t an idiot you would know that.
It’s not false advertisement, read above.
You can’t expect the server to have shitloads of people in wildy if it’s brand new and hardly nobody knows about it.
How else admin could know about glitches/bugs if you don’t tell him, that’s just being retarded.
How exactly is the admin immature?, give us more info if you aren’t just raging and making things up.
How can you know that he banned you for giving mask set away? You seem to be just another retarded player that rages when you get punished for not following the rules.

I know what I’m talking about, when I had RSCFusion up, players spreaded out all kinds of bullshit which weren’t true, and one guy even made up shitloads of ridiculous conspiracy theories.

This is what happens to every single guy that tries to open up server and who has strict rules, players that are arrogant and don’t follow up rules and get banned for whatever reason, then they start creating up massive bullshit stories.

I don’t know if the admin is like what he tells us he is, but I’m just saying that don’t believe everything you hear.

Thanks Nothing, finally someone who knows how these people are lol
On a positive note here is the end of our drop party where a 2nd cracker got droped
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QKydEZI-Nsw&feature=youtu.be[/youtube]
[/quote]
See what I mean? Even on that vid someone said that it was a setup. The RSC community is full of shit.[/quote]
every community got some raging/flaming kids who are full of shit.

You seem to get banned on lots of servers. You did in mine, even though I gave you chance to have moderator powers and show that you aren’t just another selfish scumbag.
[/quote]

lol lots of servers? name one server that i got banned from that matters? i still have a rsca account(when it was up), rsce only servers that was worth playing never did i once get banned on those. why do you come on these forums talking shit everyday to anyone go get a life.

your server was fail when it started.

o btw this is a fail server too[/quote]Hold up hold up.
Rsce, worth playing?
What?
